page.title: Returns & Exchanges
page.subtitle: If the coffee didn't suit you — we'll fix it

return_page.guarantee_text: If you didn't like the coffee — get a refund or get another variety for free
return_page.step1_text: Write to us at hello@ethiodirect.ua or via Telegram/Viber. Specify the order number and reason for return. We reply within 2 hours during business hours.
return_page.step2_text: Pack the coffee and send it via Nova Poshta to our details. We will pay for shipping if the return is our fault (damage, incorrect order).
return_page.step3_text: After receiving the item, we will refund the money to your card within 1-3 business days. Or we'll send another coffee variety of your choice.
return_page.accept_note: *If the coffee didn't suit your taste — we'll offer another variety
return_page.decline_list_2: Item purchased more than 14 days ago
return_page.decline_list_3: Mechanical damage caused by the buyer
return_page.exchange_text: If you want to exchange coffee for another variety — it's free! We will send you a new package immediately after receiving the old one. The price difference can be paid extra or refunded.
return_page.questions_text: We are always ready to help with returns or exchanges
